title: Insane Ping?!?!?
body:
Lately, I've been experiencing crazy high ping, almost up to 800. When I load into the game, all is fine, I have a constant 60-70 ping. Sometimes when I start moving, it spikes to 500. Sometimes I just get an "attempting to reconnect" message. I've tried a lot of things and nothing has worked (Disable IP helper, restart client, computer, and wifi, etc.) The problem has persisted for three days so far.
Does anyone know how to solve this?

replies.body:
Read through [this article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and check everything listed in it. 

You can also submit a [request](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=34190), the "I'm having technical issues" category is already selected, choose the appropriate sub-categories and provide all the information requested.

> [{quoted}](name=Rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=xhcV1Amt,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-28T22:59:26.521+0000)
>
> Riot is currently experiencing issues with their network, resulting in latency, packet loss and high ping. It seems to be with certain ISPs though, is your ISP Mediacom by chance? 
> 
> In the meantime you can read through [this article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and check everything listed in it. 
> 
> You can also submit a [request](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=34190), the "I'm having technical issues" category is already selected, choose the appropriate sub-categories and provide all the information requested.

This is not true. There are no current network issues.
Ya BS, your servers are spiking non stop while my ISP is sitting fine at 1gb download speed.

Lots of players are experiencing high pings and packet loss though, including all of my friends inside and outside of the US. We went through the article I linked and our issues still persist. 

It's hard to believe that many ISPs are having technical issues at the same time. 

Apologies for misleading some fellow Summoners but it seemed obvious that somethings wrong on your end.

Lots of ISPs are experiencing heavy usage due to the holiday periods and have not correctly dimensioned their networks for this load. We have many players who are playing normally on many ISPs all over the world and traffic to most of the large ISPs in the USA is via private connections that have plenty of headroom on them. A good way to spot congestion is when your ping is spiking and you have packet loss in-game. Unfortunately if the congestion is in the local access between your ISPs head office and your home, there is not a whole lot that can be done and the burden falls on the ISP to either upgrade these local segments or migrate connections to new ones.

My friends have reported that they weren't experiencing lag in Guild Wars 2 and HoTS. These are the same friends who are lagging on League. 

Not putting the blame on you guys but it's weird to only experience lag in League.

> [{quoted}](name=Rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=xhcV1Amt,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2015-12-29T00:21:52.965+0000)
>
> My friends have reported that they weren't experiencing lag in Guild Wars 2 and HoTS. These are the same friends who are lagging on League. 
> 
> Not putting the blame on you guys but it's weird to only experience lag in League.

Can you run a traceroute to 192.64.170.1 and paste the output here.

> [{quoted}](name=Korensky,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=xhcV1Amt,comment-id=000200010000,timestamp=2015-12-29T00:34:09.301+0000)
>
> Can you run a traceroute to 192.64.170.1 and paste the output here.

Love the new peering.

ping 192.64.170.1

Pinging 192.64.170.1 with 32 bytes of data:
Request timed out.
Request timed out.
Request timed out.
Request timed out.

Ping statistics for 192.64.170.1:
    Packets: Sent = 4, Received = 0, Lost = 4 (100% loss),
Also, thank you for making sure I'm on the best path to the servers! Passing this info onto my friends as well.

So my ISP needs to upgrade the segments or migrate to new ones lol. I'll ask em if they'd be so kind to do that. (No sarcasm intended and I'm serious about that).

Thank you for enlightening me. Apologies once again for misleading fellow Summoners.
"it's not our fault, its your ISP", spoken from a true F2P game rep.

I see. That explains a lot. Will make sure to explain this to my friends and Summoners I help. Apologies again for directing to blame on you guys. 

One thing though, I reached out to my ISP and they said they're not experiencing any issues (I didn't ask them about usage) but they stated that everything's fine.

Also, I know this wasn't affecting the entire playerbase and just a set amount of players.

This is like one in ten games for me.  Too often I've heard about this from my teammates too. Riot NEEDS to fix this.  I haven't had any issues until the last update.   Not too sure what is going on but this needs to be taken care of.  I can't even play ranked....{{champion:203}} {{summoner:31}} {{item:3090}}
Never had the problem before until this patch
